ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 132 SMs x 128 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) = 33,792 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 132 SMs x 64 FP64 cores/SM x 2 (FMA) = 16,896 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.tf32: 132 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 256 ops/TC/clock x 4 = 540,672 TF32 ops/clock (4th gen TC)
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 132 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 512 ops/TC/clock x 4 = 1,081,344 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 132 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 1024 ops/TC/clock x 4 = 2,162,688 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (1980 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Hopper architecture datacenter GPU. 132 SMs with 4th gen Tensor Cores. 80GB HBM3 at 3.35 TB/s. Transformer Engine with FP8 support.
